text: Sir Robert Ho Tung Library, which houses the head office of the library system Macao Central Library The Macao Public Library (; ) is the public library system of Macau. The head office is on the ground floor of the old building of the Sir Robert Ho Tung Library in São Lourenço (Saint Lawrence Parish)."Services Brochure." Macao Public Library. p. 18/20. Retrieved on April 18, 2017. "Office Addresses and Office Hours[...]Office of Macao Public Library Largo de Santo Agostinho, No. 3 (i.e. GF, old building of Sir Robert Ho Tung Library)" ==Libraries== Libraries include:"Branch Libraries." Macao Public Library. Retrieved on April 16, 2017. Portuguese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese Central District: * Macao Central Library - São Lázaro * Library in Ho Yin Garden (Biblioteca do Jardim Comendador Ho Yin; 何賢公園圖書館) - Sé North District (all in Nossa Senhora de Fátima): * Ilha Verde Library (Biblioteca da Ilha Verde; 青洲圖書館) * Mong Há Library (Biblioteca de Mong Há; 望廈圖書館) * Wong Ieng Kuan Library in (Biblioteca de Wong Ieng Kuan no Jardim da Areia Preta; 黑沙環公園黃營均圖書館) * Wong Ieng Kuan Children's Library in Areia Preta Urban Park (Biblioteca Infantil Wong Ieng Kuan no Jardim da Areia Preta; 黑沙環公園黃營均兒童圖書館) * Wong Ieng Kuan Library in Dr. Sun Yat-Sen Municipal Park (Biblioteca de Wong Ieng Kuan no Parque Dr. Sun Yat Sen; 紀念孫中山公園黃營均圖書館) Southern District (all in São Lourenço): * Sir Robert Ho Tung Library * S. Lourenço Library (Biblioteca de S. Lourenço; 下環圖書館) Western District (all in Santo António): * Patane Library (Biblioteca do Patane; 沙梨頭圖書館) * Red Market Library (Biblioteca do Mercado Vermelho; 紅街市圖書館) * Wong Ieng Kuan Library in Luis de Camões Garden (Biblioteca de Wong Ieng Kuan no Jardim Luis de Camões; 白鴿巢公園黃營均圖書館) Taipa and Coloane: * Taipa Library (Biblioteca da Taipa; 氹仔圖書館) * Wong Ieng Kuan Library in Taipa (Biblioteca de Wong Ieng Kuan da Taipa; 氹仔黃營均圖書館) * Coloane Library (Biblioteca de Coloane; 路環圖書館) ==References== ==External links== * Macao Public Library * Macao Public Library * Macao Public Library * Macao Public Library Category:Libraries in Macau Category:Public libraries in China
